text:
[Verse]
Feel the raindrops fall
On my face in the night
Let the world fade away
As we dance in the light

[Verse 2]
Splashing puddles wide
Laughing under the sky
We can chase the storm
And just kiss goodbye

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
No worries no pain
Just you and me together
In this weather forever

[Verse 3]
Our feet on wet ground
Heartbeat is the sound
Every step we take
It’s a love we found

[Bridge]
Soaked but feeling fine
Lost in a moment of time
Just your hand in mine
Underneath the shine

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
No worries no pain
Just you and me together
In this weather forever
title: Dancing in the Rain
